name: Crowd VS Traffic
description:
Try to pass little people to the other side of the road.
Be careful about city traffic and do not let your crowd crash with cars !
All you need to do is transverse run city with your mob.
developers: Loop Games Oyun Teknolojileri Anonim Sirketi
publishers: Loop Games Oyun Teknolojileri Anonim Sirketi
